title: Four Finance Firms Poised to Lead AI Automation in Financial Services
description: Four finance companies—Bill.com, Expensify, AvidXchange, and Coupa Software—are poised to dominate AI-driven automation in financial services, streamlining payments, expenses, and procurement for efficiency and growth. Amid rising AI adoption, they leverage machine learning for predictions and compliance, promising transformative value despite cybersecurity risks. The future favors innovative automation leaders.

title: More than 20% of videos shown to new YouTube users are ‘AI slop’, study finds
description: Low-quality AI-generated content is now saturating social media – and generating about $117m a year, data showsMore than 20% of the videos that YouTube’s algorithm shows to new users are “AI slop” – low-quality AI-generated content designed to farm views, research has found.The video-editing...

title: I asked AI for 15 Sunderland pubs to see in the New Year in 1975. Here's what it chose
description: We’ll all be singing Auld Lang Syne before you know it - but I wondered where you would have done it in Sunderland in 1975.
